resources.string: Access general location
Access specific location
Access network details
Access wireless network details
Use paired Bluetooth devices
Discover Bluetooth devices
Read body sensors (e.g. heartrate)
Scan for devices on the wireless network
Change wireless state
List running apps and software on device
Connect to the Internet
Read NFC tags
Access phone call log
Access local contact address book
Read Purple Robot data on user-accessible storage
Use local accounts to generate unique identifier (e.g. Gmail e-mail address)
Access SMS text conversations
Launch when device boots
Enable haptic vibration notifications
Prevent device\'s low-power mode from affecting data collection and schedules
Write Purple Robot data to user-accessible storage
Determine when a call is in-progress or access other information about the device (including hardware identifiers)
Use microphone to record audio (when Audio Capture Probe is enabled) and analyze sound in the ambient environment
Access mobile browser history and bookmarks
Use sensors to predict current activity (running, walking, etc.)
Access Google Services details
The Raw Location probe needs permission to access your location to gather the information it is intended to collect.
The Fused Location probe needs permission to access your location to gather the information it is intended to collect.
The Location probe needs permission to access your location to gather the information it is intended to collect.
The Touch Events probe needs permission to collect data about how you interact with this device. Tap here to grant Purple Robot permission to draw over other apps.
The Audio Features probe needs access to your microphone to analyze the sound pitch and volume of the area around you.
The WiFi Access Points probe needs access to your location to report details about the access points in your area.
The Hardware Information probe requires access to your phone state to report your device\'s unique hardware identifier.
The Telephony probe needs access to the device\'s call state and identifiers.
The Communication Log probe needs access to your text messaging logs to analyze your communication patterns.
The Communication Log probe needs access to your phone call logs to analyze your communication patterns.
The Communication Event probe needs access to your text messaging logs to analyze your communication patterns.
The Communication Event probe needs access to your phone call logs to analyze your communication patterns.
The Call History probe needs access to your phone call logs to analyze your communication patterns.
Cannot categorize or label contacts until permission is granted to read the device\'s call log.
Cannot categorize or label contacts until permission is granted to read the device\'s address book.
